item.title: Vps help how to run server?`rep++
item.dc:creator: @BarrageScape508 BarrageScape508
item.description:
@BarrageScape508 wrote:

To run your server on a VPS/Dedi:
You have to:

  1. Go to Remote Desktop Connection by going to

[tt]Start --> All Programs --> Accessories --> Remote Desktop Connection[/tt]

  1. Once there, It will ask for your connection, or IP, enter it in.

  2. Once you are in, there will be a box saying “Username” and “Password”, enter them in.

  3. Add your server to the VPS.


That is basically it.

Read full topic
item.source: Vps help how to run server?`rep++
